task_summary: A robot arm pours the contents from a cup into a mug on a table, as depicted across 9 sequential frames.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a stationary robot manipulator pouring a liquid or material from a cup it holds into a mug positioned on a table. The robot must detect and locate the mug, move the cup directly above it, perform a controlled pour by tilting the cup, and finally retreat, avoiding collisions or spillage. Timing and accuracy are critical to ensure the mug receives the full contents.
preconditions: Robot gripper is already holding the cup.
Mug is present and visible on the workspace.
Table workspace is clear of obstructions.
stepwise_plan: Perceive and locate the mug on the table.
Move the held cup above the detected mug.
Pour from the cup into the mug by tilting the cup.
Retreat to a safe position after pouring.
success_criteria: Mug contains the cup contents after pouring.
No collision between robot and mug/table.
Robot retreats safely upon task completion.
failure_and_recovery: Failed mug detection: retry perception or scan again.
Pour misalignment or missed: abort or reposition to retry.
Spillage detected: initiate cleanup or alert operator.
task_long_description.termination: Task ends after retreating post-pour and confirming mug occupancy.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Detect and locate the mug on the workspace
Move the held cup above the detected mug
Pour from the cup into the mug by tilting the cup

failure_modes: Robot collisions with mug or table
recovery_strategy: Retry mug detection if initial attempt fails
Re-align above mug and attempt pour again if pour fails
Stop and retreat if collision detected
assumptions: The cup is already grasped by the robot gripper at the start (frames confirm, though not stated in instruction).
No explicit amount or rate specified; set to null per library rule.
All object labels (cup, mug) are assigned matching frame evidence.
Frames do not contradict the instruction.

expected_success_criteria: Mug contains poured contents at end state (frame_8).
Robot arm does not collide with mug or table.
